title: Myles Garrett LOSES IT on Mason Rudolph, Browns-Steelers TNF Recap (Football 11/15)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to a crazy ending between the Browns and Steelers as Myles Garrett swung his helmet and hit Mason Rudolph in the head as part of a wild sequence that will surely result in suspensions (1:15). The guys also recap Cleveland's 21-7 victory over Pittsburgh and how it was overshadowed by what happened late (18:00). Next, the Pick Six Superfriends discuss Colin Kaepernick's workout (35:30) and progress on a new CBA (52:00), before answering your 5-star Apple Podcast questions (57:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
